title: Signal Integrity - RF Integrity Validation Engineer
summary: Do you like to work on groundbreaking technologies that enable amazing new products? Do you have the attention for details and love for perfection to work towards an outstanding result? We are looking for a talented and passionate Power Integrity Engineer to join our team...
description:
-  Collaborate with package, system, and product teams to debug complex noise/crosstalk issues in lab environment.
-  Develop test plans to validate system performance and debug various RF related issues...
-  Review product designs at the schematic, board layout, and physical design levels.
key_qualifications:
BS and 10+ years of relevant industry experience.
Excellent problem solving skills in a multidimensional and sophisticated environment...
Excellent written and verbal communication skills with ability to present ideas and perform independent research and development work.
preferred_qualifications:
Define PCB requirement on schematic and layout to meet validation need.
Knowledge on EM simulation tools and circuit simulation tools...
Knowledge of RF front-end, PLL, and general wireless systems measurements (i.e. NF, Tx power, nonlinearity, phase noise, spur, etc.).
education_experience: BS and 10+ years of relevant industry experience.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location...
